name: Desktop Snow v0.1
description:
A Desktop Snow Simulator. This is a very buggy test of the concept, but I will improve it and add many features to it. 

In future updates I will add multiple minigames. Some ideas are:

Minecraft: You can mine any windows you have open. Eventually will become a full game. 

Angry-Birds style game.

Tower Defense style game.

Platformer: Moves the windows around, and you have to reach certain goals. 

If you have any suggestions, leave a comment.
